name: "Son of Zorn" - The Pilot Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: The show is a mixture of live action and animation.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The show features the animated Zorn trying to assimilate into the culture of California. He is drawn to look a lot like a barbarian, and carries a sword. The opening scene was all animation, then the show transferred to live-action with Zorn being animated.

questions.text: What country was Zorn born in?
questions.explanation:
Zephyria.

	In the pilot he moved from Zephyria to California in order to be closer to his son.  His son, Alangulon, turned 17 in the pilot. Zephyria is an island nation.

questions.text: When Zorn returned to the U.S. what surprise did his ex-wife have for him?
questions.explanation:
She was engaged.

	Her fiance, Craig, was played by Tim Meadows. He was a teacher at an online college. The ex-wife, Edie, was played by Cheryl Hines.

questions.text: What was installed at Alan's school after a previous visit from Zorn?
questions.explanation:
Metal detectors.

	Zorn had brought his sword with him to the school and was swinging it around in the halls. Alan's friend was upset because he couldn't bring his Altoids to school anymore.

questions.text: What food was Zorn excited to have?
questions.explanation:
Hot Pockets.

	Edie brought him food while he was camping out. He was excited to see the bag of groceries, but upset over the flavor of the Hot Pockets.

questions.text: What did Zorn get his son for a gift?
questions.explanation:
A brain gouger.

	The brain gouger was also animated when Alangulon opened it. The gift was three weeks late. Alan's soon to be stepfather wanted to use the brain gouger to take away the pain he was feeling.

questions.text: Zorn got a job doing what in California?
questions.explanation:
Selling soap dispensers.

	At first he was only supposed to stay the weekend, but then he decided to stay and get closer to his son after talking to Edie about their relationship. He went and got a job, an apartment and a haircut.

True.

	Zorn tried to order him a ribeye steak, not cooked, while they were at a restaurant. Alangulon then changed his order to a veggie wrap. Zorn was later kicked out of the restaurant for carrying a weapon.

questions.text: What item of clothing did Zorn have to wear at work that he didn't normally wear?
questions.explanation:
Shirt.

	His boss made him agree to wear a shirt in order to get the job.  He still wore his loincloth and carried his sword though.

questions.text: What did Zorn get his son as a mode of transportation?
questions.explanation:
A Deathhawk.

	It was an older model, with parasites living in its flesh. The death hawk was more than 8 feet tall and had razor sharp talons. Zorn got it as a way to help Alangulon avoid riding the bus to school.
